#Mailcheap

[Mailcheap.co](https://www.mailcheap.co/) (Cyberlabs s.r.o. CZ & Cyberlabs Inc. USA) is happy to announce the launch of Premium Mail: Email with a focus on uptime, deliverability and data integrity.


Achieved by cross datacenter active-active redundancy, Mailcheap's Premium relay and triple data replication.


#Products

- [Premium Mail ](https://www.mailcheap.co/premium_mail.html)
- [Enterprise Email ](https://www.mailcheap.co/email.html)
- [Inbound spam filtering / Mail forwarding ](https://www.mailcheap.co/spamfilter.html)
- [Backup MX / Queuing relay service ](https://www.mailcheap.co/backupmx.html)
- [SMTP Relays with Outbound/Inbound Spam Filtering ](https://www.mailcheap.co/smtprelays.html)


#Features:

- **Unlimited Users**
- **5-20 Domains**
- **10 GB to 250 GB Storage**
- **Cross-DC Active-Active redundancy**
- **High performance servers**
- **Failover in <2 min (90s avg.)**
- **Triple data replication**
- **99.999% uptime**
- **~100% deliverability**: Carrier grade outbound filtering & Premium SMTP relays
- WebMail, Contacts (CardDAV) & Calendar (CalDAV) w/ ActiveSync [SOGo]: 50 MB att.
- Sieve filtering, vacation auto responder.
- Free setup & migration (1 file)
- IMAP, SMTP (Premium relay), POP3 support
- Web based admin panel
- Anti-spam & anti-virus protection (4-step filtration) w/ quarantine management
- DDoS protection
- Dual backup MX/Mail servers as standard
- Fully Open source
- Comprehensive documentation (beginner friendly)
- Direct-Admin™ support
